common.image_container_bg_color: This color will be used as the container background color of the Product/Collection/Category/Brand images wherever applicable
common.clip_image_to_fit_container: If the image aspect ratio is different from the container, the image will be clipped to fit the container. The aspect ratio of the image will be maintained
common.heading: Heading
common.not_applicable_for_mobile: It'll not work for mobile layout
common.category_name_placement_info: Place the category name inside or outside the image
common.infinite_scroll_info: If it is enabled, view more button will not be shown, only on scroll products will be displayed
common.open_product_in_new_tab_desktop: Open product in new tab for desktop

header.one_click_search_info: It provides one click search in header, this option will only be functional with a "Double Row Navigation" Layout configuration
header.mega_menu_double_row_required: The mega menu will only be displayed with a "Double Row Navigation" Layout configuration
header.show_border_on_desktop_info: It adds a border below header on desktop devices
header.use_full_width_mega_menu_info: The mega menu will be full width
header.date_range_info: Show delivery promise in date range

footer.social_media_text_info: Show Label text for social media

cart_and_button_configuration.applies_to_product_pdp_featured_section: Applies to Product Card, PDP and Featured Product Section
cart_and_button_configuration.applicable_pdp_featured_product: Applicable for PDP and Featured Product Section
cart_and_button_configuration.display_in_place_of_add_to_cart: Displays in place of Add to Cart when enabled

product_card_configuration.default_aspect_ratio_limit: Default aspect ratio is 0.8. User can update between 0.6 to 1. For more than 1 it will be set to default 0.8. Applicable for lisiting pages, product page & featured collection section
product_card_configuration.hover_image_display: This option controls whether an additional image is displayed when hovering over the product card

other_page_configuration.home_page_performance_impact: This may affect your page performance. Applicable for home-page

google_maps.google_maps_api_key_info: This API key helps connect your site to Google Maps so you can display interactive maps and location details

application_banner.box_pointer_only: Only applicable for box pointer type
application_banner.circular_pointer_only: Only applicable for circular pointer type

brand_listing.brand_alignment: Align brand cards to the left, right or centre of the page in desktop
brand_listing.all_is_unique: All is unique no matter how you put it

cart_landing.orders_india_only: Applicable only for orders in India

categories_listing.category_name_alignment: Display category name at top, bottom or center
categories_listing.align_category_name: Align category name left, right or center
categories_listing.max_items_per_row_horizontal: Maximum items allowed per row for Horizontal view, for gallery max 5 are viewable and only 5 blocks are required

collections_listing.select_collection_info: Select a collection to display its products. Applicable when the section is used on pages other than the collection listing page
collections_listing.button_link_info: Select the destination link where users will be redirected when they click on the banner image
collections_listing.product_number_info: Show the number of products in the listing
collections_listing.loading_options_info: Choose how products load on the page based on user interaction. Infinite Scroll continuously loads more products as users scroll. Pagination organises products into separate pages with navigation controls. View More loads additional products only when users click a button
collections_listing.show_size_guide_info: Applicable for Add to Cart popup
collections_listing.heading_info: Set the heading text for the collections page
collections_listing.description_info: Add a description for the collections page
collections_listing.collection_title_info: Place collection title and button inside or outside the image

featured_collection.select_collection_for_products: Select a collection to display its products
featured_collection.max_items_per_row_horizontal_scroll: Maximum items allowed per row in horizontal scroll
featured_collection.max_products_horizontal_scroll: Maximum products to show in horizontal scroll

hero_image.primary_button_inverted_color: Inverted color of the primary button
hero_image.image_overlay_opacity: Use this option to add a black or white semi-transparent overlay on top of the image. This will help you to stand out your text content

hero_video.video_support_mp4_youtube: Supports MP4 Video & Youtube Video URL
hero_video.enable_autoplay_muted: Check to enable autoplay (Video will be muted if autoplay is active)
hero_video.display_pause_on_hover_info: Show pause button on video hover on desktop

image_gallery.items_per_row_limit_for_scroll: Items per row should be less than number of blocks to show horizontal scroll

image_slideshow.open_links_in_new_tab_info: Enable to open slide links in a new tab

media_with_text.text_align_mobile: Set text alignment for mobile devices

multi_collection_product_list.view_all_requires_heading: "View All" will be visible only if a "Heading" is provided
multi_collection_product_list.icon_or_navigation_name_mandatory: Icon or Navigation Name is mandatory

product_description.show_brand_logo_name_in_pincode_section: The pincode section will show the brand logo and name

raw_html.custom_html_code_editor: Add Your custom HTML Code below. You can also use the full screen icon to open a code editor and add your code

trust_marker.card_background_color_info: This color will be used as card background
trust_marker.not_applicable_desktop: It'll not work for desktop layout

blog.filter_by_tags_info: Blog tags are case-sensitive. Enter the identical tag used on the Fynd platform, separated by commas, to display the blog post in the slideshow.
blog.blog_tags_info: Blog tags are case-sensitive. Enter the identical tag used on the Fynd platform, separated by commas, to display the blog post in the slideshow
blog.recently_published_info: The Recently Published section will display the latest five published blogs
blog.top_viewed_info: The Top Viewed section will display the latest five published blogs tagged with the 'top5' value
blog.change_slides_every_info: Set speed at which slides to be autoplayed in blog slideshow
blog.loading_options_info: Choose how blogs load on the page based on user interaction. Infinite Scroll continuously loads more blogs as users scroll. Pagination organises blogs into separate pages with navigation controls

contact_us.banner_alignment_info: Select the alignment for the banner

products_listing.desktop_banner_info: Upload an image to be displayed as a banner on desktop devices
products_listing.mobile_banner_info: Upload an image to be displayed as a banner on mobile devices
products_listing.description_info: Add a description to be displayed at the bottom of the product listing page
products_listing.show_size_guide_info: Show size guide in add to cart popup. Not applicable for international websites
products_listing.tax_label_info: Set the text for the price tax label displayed in the 'Add to Cart' popup. Not applicable for international websites
products_listing.size_selection_style_info: Select the size display format in Add to Cart popup. Not applicable for international websites

brand_landing.back_to_top_info: Enable a 'Back to Top' button to help users quickly return to the top of the page.
brand_landing.heading_info: Set the heading text for the brands page
brand_landing.description_info: Add a description for the brands page

categories.heading_info: Set the heading text for the categories page
categories.description_info: Add a description for the categories page
categories.show_category_name_info: Show the category name on the category cards
categories.category_name_placement_info: Place the category name on the inside or outside the category card
categories.category_name_text_alignment_info: Select the alignment of the category name - left, center or right
categories.bottom_info: Display category name at the top, center or bottom of the category card
categories.item_count_mobile_info: Maximum items allowed per row for Horizontal view on mobile

wishlist.mandatory_delivery_check_info: Mandatory delivery check in Add to Cart popup. Not applicable for international websites
wishlist.preselect_size_info: Preselect size in Add to Cart popup. Applicable only for multi-sized products. Not applicable for international websites
wishlist.hide_single_size_info: Hide single size in Add to Cart popup. Not applicable for international websites

default_values.blog_description: Everything you need for that ultimate stylish wardrobe, Fynd has got it!
default_values.cta_text: Be exclusive, Be Divine, Be yourself
default_values.collects_listing_description: Organize your products into these collections to help customers easily find what they're looking for. Each category can showcase a different aspect of your store's offerings
default_values.feature_blog_description: Chique is a fast-growing indowestern womenswear brand having several stores pan India. Simple, innovative and progressive
default_values.featured_collection_description: Showcase your top collections here! Whether it's new arrivals, trending items, or special promotions, use this space to draw attention to what's most important in your store
default_values.hero_image_description: Begin your journey by adding unique images and banners. This is your chance to create a captivating first impression. Customize it to reflect your brand's personality and style!
default_values.image_gallery_description: This flexible gallery lets you highlight key products and promotions, guiding customers to the right places
default_values.testimonial_title: What People Are Saying About Us
default_values.testimonial_textarea: Add customer reviews and testimonials to showcase your store's happy customers
default_values.marker_description: Don`t love it? Don`t worry. Return delivery is free
